description:
Aki tells her friends about a cute boy she met on her way to school who might become her new love, but neither Yumi nor Chiharu are impressed by her story.
Later, Chiharu visits the place of her childhood friend Kyouichi, and her behavior (as well as a little teasing by Makoto`s older sister Sayaka) almost turns the boy`s head. After a little incident with Chiharu`s skirt, Sayaka orders Kyouichi to walk Chiharu home, and suddenly the boy has to face a strange question.

titles.title: Light Shower of Cherry Blossoms: Cherry-Blossoms
